projects.title: Modern E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution built with React.js frontend and Laravel backend
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack e-commerce solution built with React.js and Laravel.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering
projects.challenges: Implementing real-time inventory updates and ensuring secure payment processing
projects.solutions: Used WebSockets for real-time updates and implemented robust payment validation
projects.results: Increased conversion rate by 25% and reduced cart abandonment by 40%

projects.title: WordPress E-commerce Store
projects.description: Custom WooCommerce store with advanced features and optimized performance
projects.shortDescription: Custom WooCommerce store with advanced features.
projects.challenges: Creating a custom theme that maintains WooCommerce functionality while meeting design requirements
projects.solutions: Developed a child theme with custom hooks and filters to extend WooCommerce functionality
projects.results: Improved page load speed by 60% and increased organic traffic by 35%

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Modern dashboard interface with real-time data visualization and interactive charts
projects.shortDescription: Modern dashboard interface with real-time data visualization.
projects.challenges: Creating intuitive data visualizations that work across different screen sizes
projects.solutions: Used responsive chart libraries and implemented custom breakpoints for optimal viewing
projects.results: Reduced data analysis time by 50% and improved user engagement by 45%

projects.title: Business Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive business management platform with user roles and advanced reporting
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive business management platform with user roles.
projects.challenges: Implementing complex business logic while maintaining system performance
projects.solutions: Used Laravel's queue system for background jobs and implemented caching strategies
projects.results: Streamlined business processes and reduced manual work by 70%

projects.title: Mobile App UI Design
projects.description: Complete mobile app interface design with user journey mapping and prototyping
projects.shortDescription: Complete mobile app interface design with user journey mapping.
projects.challenges: Creating an intuitive interface for a complex financial app
projects.solutions: Conducted extensive user research and created multiple iterations based on feedback
projects.results: Improved user satisfaction score by 80% and reduced onboarding time by 60%

projects.title: Shopify E-commerce Store
projects.description: Custom Shopify store with advanced product filtering and seamless checkout experience
projects.shortDescription: Custom Shopify store with advanced product filtering.
projects.challenges: Implementing complex product filtering while maintaining Shopify's performance
projects.solutions: Used Shopify's metafields and custom JavaScript for advanced filtering
projects.results: Increased average order value by 30% and improved conversion rate by 25%
